transitions.throw: v.x = 0; v.y = q.target_y_rotation; for_each(t.x, q.get_nearby_entities(2, 'minecraft:splash_potion'), {(t.x -> q.life_time < 0.1 && !t.x -> q.is_on_ground) ? {v.y = t.x -> q.target_y_rotation; v.x = 1;};}); return v.x + math.trunc(q.target_y_rotation - v.y);

transitions.hold: v.x = 0; v.y = q.target_y_rotation; for_each(t.x, q.get_nearby_entities(2, 'minecraft:arrow'), {(t.x -> q.life_time < 0.1 && !t.x -> q.is_on_ground) ? {v.y = t.x -> q.target_y_rotation; v.x = 1;};}); return v.x + math.trunc(q.target_y_rotation - v.y);

transitions.teleport: (math.sqrt(math.abs(q.position(0) - v.posx) * math.abs(q.position(0) - v.posx) + math.abs(q.position(2) - v.posz) * math.abs(q.position(2) - v.posz)) > 1 && q.ground_speed == 0.0)
